questions.question: What additional items are required for night VFR for the aircraft (91.511) and crew (91.221)?
questions.answer: A means of indicating rate of turn and slip (unless equipped with a third attitude indicator usable through 360° of pitch and roll). Position lights. An anti-collision light system. An operable electric torch for each crew member.

references.text: CAR Part 91 (91.511 - Night VFR. 91.221(a)(4) - Flying equipment and operating information).
